mapper.select: SELECT no, dong, aptname, dealamount,buildyear,dealyear,dealmonth,dealday,area,floor,jibun FROM housedeal WHERE dong=#{dong} AND aptname=#{aptname} ORDER BY cast(dealyear as unsigned int),cast(dealmonth as unsigned int), cast(dealday as unsigned int)

select i.no no,i.dong dong, i.aptname aptname,i.code code,i.buildyear buildyear,i.jibun jibun,i.lat lat, i.lng lng,i.img img, d.high high, d.low low from houseinfo i join (select aptname, dong,max(dealamount) high, min(dealamount) low from housedeal group by dong,aptname) d on i.aptname = d.aptname and i.dong = d.dong order by no asc limit 1000

select i.no,i.dong,i.aptname,i.code,i.buildyear,i.jibun,i.lat,i.lng,i.img, d.high,d.low from houseinfo i join (select aptname, dong,max(dealamount) high, min(dealamount) low from housedeal group by dong,aptname) d on i.aptname = d.aptname and i.dong = d.dong where i.dong LIKE '%${dong}%' AND i.aptname LIKE '%${aptname}%' and cast(replace(d.high,',','') as unsigned int) <= #{dealamount_end} and cast(replace(d.low,',','') as unsigned int) >= #{dealamount_start}
select d.dong from seouldong d join seoulgu g on d.guNum = g.no where g.guname=#{selectedGu}

select i.no,i.dong,i.aptname,i.code,i.buildyear,i.jibun,i.lat,i.lng,i.img, d.high,d.low from houseinfo i join (select aptname, dong,max(dealamount) high, min(dealamount) low from housedeal group by dong,aptname) d on i.aptname = d.aptname and i.dong = d.dong where i.dong = #{dongName} order by no desc

select i.no,i.dong,i.aptname,i.code,i.buildyear,i.jibun,i.lat,i.lng,i.img, d.high,d.low from houseinfo i join (select aptname, dong,max(dealamount) high, min(dealamount) low from housedeal group by dong,aptname) d on i.aptname = d.aptname and i.dong = d.dong where i.dong in (select dong.dong from seouldong dong left join seoulgu gu on dong.gunum = gu.no where gu.guname = #{guName}) order by no desc

select schul_nm name, org_telno telno, hmpg_adres homepage, coedu_sc_nm info, hs_gnrl_busns_sc_nm highschoolkind, address, cast(lat as double) lat, cast(lng as double) lng from school where address like '%${selectedGu}%';
select cast(lat as double) lat, cast(lng as double) lng from baseaddress where dong like '%${selectedDong}%' and lat != 0 and lng != 0 limit 1;
